explanation: [0-0] On a kitchen counter, a left hand holds a small, bird-shaped stemmed glass on the left, while a right hand presses down on a white pump bottle. The white pump head is facing the opening of the bird-shaped stemmed glass. The corner of a sink is visible in the lower left corner, with a high-pressure glass rinser placed beside it.

[0-6] First, the right hand presses the pump head once, dispensing a light yellow liquid from the white bottle into the bird-shaped stemmed glass. The right hand removes the white pump bottle. The shot changes to the right hand placing the opening of the bird-shaped stemmed glass in the center of the high-pressure glass rinser and pressing down. White foam fills the bird-shaped stemmed glass. The right hand lifts the glass, and the foam overflows, flowing through the high-pressure glass rinser into the sink in the lower left corner.
